argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_lencl | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( # ` W ) e. NN0 ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_nn0zd | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( # ` W ) e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zsubcl | |- ( ( ( # ` W ) e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( # ` W ) - N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( # ` W ) - N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_2cshw | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ /\ ( ( # ` W ) - N ) e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) = ( W cyclShift ( N + ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) = ( W cyclShift ( N + ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_nn0cnd | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( # ` W ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_pncan3 | |- ( ( N e. CC /\ ( # ` W ) e. CC ) -> ( N + ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) = ( # ` W ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( N + ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) = ( # ` W ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift ( N + ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) ) = ( W cyclShift ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_cshwn | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( W cyclShift ( # ` W ) ) = W ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( W cyclShift ( # ` W ) ) = W ) |
| 14 | 6, 11, 13 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) cyclShift ( ( # ` W ) - N ) ) = W ) |
